short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add borders & background to all elements to help in pixel precise alignments and layouts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aligning a <div>. An age old problem faced by many beginners like me. Fret no more as this extension aims to alleviate that by showing you the borders of each visible element. Once you can see the borders, it becomes easier to work towards achieving that perfect alignment!
